seller_description: Organic Kombucha [Filtered Water, Kombucha Culture (Yeast and Bacteria Cultures), Organic Black Tea, Organic Green Tea, Organic Cane Sugar, Carbonation], Cold-Pressed Organic Tangerine Juice, Cold-Pressed Organic Passion Fruit Juice, Cold Pressed Organic Orange juice.
review: I recently used the Health-Ade Kombucha bottles for a DIY project, and they were perfect! The sturdy glass and colorful labels made them ideal for creating decorative flower vases for my dining table. The watermelon label added a pop of color that matched my summer-themed decor. I haven’t tried the drink yet, but these bottles have already brightened up my space. Highly recommend for craft enthusiasts looking for quality glass containers!
expected-output: Seller’s Description:The seller describes the product as an organic kombucha containing filtered water, acids from fermentation (acetic, lactic, gluconic, tartaric), cane sugar, apple juice, black tea, green tea, raisin juice concentrate, kombucha cultures, and carbonation. The description emphasizes its organic certification and probiotic benefits, appealing to health-conscious consumers.Seller’s Image:The seller’s image highlights a single bottle of Health-Ade Kombucha, focusing on its high-quality branding, health claims, and vibrant label design. The bottle features clear and professional packaging, consistent with the product’s premium nature.Buyer’s Image:The buyer’s image shows multiple kombucha bottles in a box, with the prominent watermelon flavor. The bottles are identical in shape, label design, and branding to the seller’s image. The packaging ensures that the bottles are securely delivered, consistent with expectations.Positive Irrelevant Review:he review focuses entirely on the aesthetic value of the kombucha bottles and their potential for reuse or decoration. While the product's taste and health benefits are not mentioned, the buyer expresses satisfaction with the presentation and design.
label: -1 buyers opinion
